item.title: Sup world
item.description: So, this will be yet another techie blog. Plain old me, writing about my journey to the depths of hell (Full Stack Development - a.k.a. obsesive curiosity disorder with sparkles of masochism). Before we start I want to state that english is not my primary/native langua... Oh god why, not that clich√© disclaimer again. Nevermind, I had planned to build this website in both English and Spanish from day 1, so the joke's on you! Not that anything I just wrote back there made any sense, but now that you've got an idea of my definitely not clinically insane line of thought and super funny sense of humour, let's dive into what we came for.
item.dc:creator: Fernando Valverde <fdov88@gmail.com>
